Name: Hotdog Man
About the game: Hotdog Man is a recreational puzzle game, you need to control the direction and strength of the character to eat a hot dog successfully. How to play: A key,D key,Mouse wheel is control direction. The left mouse button is launched. You have to eat all the hot dogs to get through. There are different girls at each level. Secret code input: r18
